<!--
For pull requests that need extra checks you can declare slash actions in the description. Don't need the check? Delete it from the description.

Available commands:

- / playwright — Runs all non-smoke Playwright tests.
- / playwright-electron — Runs all non-smoke Triplex Standalone Playwright tests.
- / playwright-vsce — Runs all non-smoke Triplex for VS Code Playwright tests.

You must remove the space between the slash and command (" ") for it to be picked up every commit.
-->
